articles.description: With the rapper planning to challenge Donald Trump, could we see Kim as chief justice? Oprah for secretary of state? Elon Musk for defence?
articles.content: I was wondering what more could happen to make 2020 even worse. Alien invasion? Obliterating asteroid? Actual Armageddon? But musician and part-time ranter Kanye West was way ahead of me, as geniuses… [+1595 chars]
